navigation.aboutUsDescription: Learn more about the team behind MojeFaktury.
navigation.productsDescription: All the tools you need to simplify your invoice workflow.

hero.title: Invoice processing made
hero.description: Stop wasting hours on manual invoice data entry. MojeFaktury extracts key data fields from invoices using AI and lets you export everything to Excel or CSV in seconds.

description.longText: MojeFaktury is an intelligent SaaS platform that streamlines invoice processing using advanced OCR (Optical Character Recognition) technology. Built for freelancers, accountants, and small businesses, it lets you easily upload invoices in PDF or image formats and automatically extracts key data such as seller and buyer info, invoice number, issue dates, totals, VAT, and itemized rows. Parsed data can be reviewed, edited, and exported directly to Excel or CSV files — ready for use in accounting software or reports. The platform is fully cloud-based, fast, and requires no installation or setup. With MojeFaktury, you eliminate manual data entry, reduce errors, save valuable time, and gain full control over your invoicing workflow. It's an essential tool for anyone looking to automate repetitive tasks and focus on growing their business.

login.title: Sign in to MojeFaktury
login.subtitle: Manage your invoices and account in one place.
login.sidebarDescription: Save time with automatic invoice data extraction.

cards.description1: Drag & drop your PDF, JPG, or PNG invoices in seconds. No installation required – just upload and get instant data extraction.
cards.description2: Easily manage, filter, and organize all your invoices in one place. Get full visibility into your billing history and streamline your document flow.
cards.description3: Transfer structured invoice data effortlessly to Excel (XLSX) or CSV formats for use in accounting tools, reports, or backups.
cards.description4: All data is encrypted and stored securely in the cloud. MojeFaktury follows strict GDPR standards for privacy and compliance.
cards.description5: Built with scalability in mind — MojeFaktury will soon offer API access and accounting integrations to fit your existing workflow.
cards.sectionDescription: MojeFaktury helps you work faster and more accurately by simplifying invoice workflows. Upload, review, organize, and export — all in one secure platform tailored for freelancers, accountants, and growing businesses.
